attributes.additional_details:
Mrs May's so called deal does not deliver control of our laws, not does it deliver control over who and on what terms we trade. It gives away £39bn of OUR money in exchange for exactly nothing.

The government, parliament, the media and every person the remain side could muster aligned and campaigned against the UK leaving in 2016, we experienced industrial scale scare mongering and despite all this the people still voted to leave. Parliament has expressly tried to overule the people ever since.
attributes.background:
Both Conservative and Labour party candidates stood on a promise of delivering on the result of the referendum in full in the snap election of 2017.

Both parties have since conspired to overrule the wishes of the people
